title.narrative: Process consultant. Taskforce for developing the ‘Strategic Framework. Denmark’s partnership with the Eastern Neighbourhood Countries.’

description.narrative:
In order to improve the next phase of the Neighbourhood Program (2022 – 2026) we have decided to develop an overall ‘Strategic Framework for Denmark’s Partnership with the Eastern neighbourhood countries.’
The objective for the Process Consultant is to assist the taskforce and EUN with developing and implementing the process, which will result in the creation of the new Strategic Framework. Here, the consultant has to organise and participate in both meetings in the taskforce, workshops and in consultations with the partners and stakeholders in the Eastern Partner countries, where Denmark does not have representations on the ground (also in Ukraine in agreement with the Embassy). Furthermore, the consultant will also contribute with presentations to the Program Committee and UPR. Finally, the consultant will also be one of the main authors of the draft for the new strategic framework.
